articles.title: Most distant supernova: James Webb sees a star explode at cosmic dawn
articles.description: Scientists have detected the most distant supernova ever seen, exploding when the universe was less than a billion years old. articles.title: Mini brains reveal clear brain signals of schizophrenia and bipolar disorder

articles.title: Losing weight in midlife may have a hidden brain cost

articles.title: Why your vitamin D supplements might not be working
articles.description: A randomized trial from Vanderbilt-Ingram Cancer Center reveals that magnesium may be the missing key to keeping vitamin D levels in balance. articles.title: Zombie worms are missing and scientists are alarmed
articles.description: When researchers lowered whale bones into the deep ocean, they expected zombie worms to quickly move in.
